title: Maggie

| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A former Hell Knight apprentice. Impatient with the progress she was making with her former master, Maggie entered the Dungeon in search of a shortcut to fame and fortune. Lacking any sort of imagination on how to achieve this, she has settled on trying to slay a dragon - or two or three dragons, if one is not enough. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Spells](#Spells)
- [4 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [5 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Maggie the Vainglorious** is a [unique](/Unique "Unique") [fire elementalist](/Fire_elementalist "Fire elementalist") apprentice. She wears [steam](/Steam_dragon_scales "Steam dragon scales"), [acid](/Acid_dragon_scales "Acid dragon scales"), or [swamp dragon scales](/Swamp_dragon_scales "Swamp dragon scales").

She is a younger, weaker version of [Margery](/Margery "Margery"). Maggie and Margery are mutually exclusive; if one appears in a game, the other will not.

## Location

- [The Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"):6-10
- [The Lair](/The_Lair "The Lair"):1-2

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                     |                                                     |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire") (3d13) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Mesmerise](/Mesmerise "Mesmerise")                 | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Her [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire") seriously hurts, but Maggie herself is reasonably squishy. Try to disable her with [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes") or a [wand](/Wand "Wand") if possible -- her [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") and [hit dice](/Hit_dice "Hit dice") are both mediocre. [Mephitic Cloud](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud") or [darts](/Dart "Dart") are also effective as long as she isn't wearing swamp dragon scales, though darts will require some skill in using them to be reliable.
- If you get [mesmerised](/Mesmerised "Mesmerised") and need to retreat, you'll need to either disable Maggie using one of the aforementioned methods or break [line-of-sight](/LOS "LOS"). Reading a [scroll of teleportation](/Scroll_of_teleportation "Scroll of teleportation") or [scroll of fog](/Scroll_of_fog "Scroll of fog") will work adequately.
- Maggie has a small chance of spawning with a slightly pre-enchanted [Wyrmbane](/Wyrmbane "Wyrmbane"). This artefact is an excellent weapon, if you can manage to take it from her.

## History

- Maggie was added in version [0.25](/0.25 "0.25").
html:
Maggie

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Maggie @ 
HP 39-80
HD 5
XP 395
Speed 10
AC 6
EV 9
Will 20
Attack1 10 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type human, human
Flags Speaks
Warm-blooded
Unique
Female
A former Hell Knight apprentice. Impatient with the progress she was making with her former master, Maggie entered the Dungeon in search of a shortcut to fame and fortune. Lacking any sort of imagination on how to achieve this, she has settled on trying to slay a dragon - or two or three dragons, if one is not enough.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Spells
  • 4 Tips & Tricks
  • 5 History

Useful Info

Maggie the Vainglorious is a unique fire elementalist apprentice. She wears steam, acid, or swamp dragon scales.

She is a younger, weaker version of Margery. Maggie and Margery are mutually exclusive; if one appears in a game, the other will not.

Location

  • The Dungeon:6-10
  • The Lair:1-2

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Bolt of Fire (3d13) Wizard flag
Slot2 Mesmerise Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Her Bolt of Fire seriously hurts, but Maggie herself is reasonably squishy. Try to disable her with Hexes or a wand if possible -- her willpower and hit dice are both mediocre. Mephitic Cloud or darts are also effective as long as she isn't wearing swamp dragon scales, though darts will require some skill in using them to be reliable.
  • If you get mesmerised and need to retreat, you'll need to either disable Maggie using one of the aforementioned methods or break line-of-sight. Reading a scroll of teleportation or scroll of fog will work adequately.
  • Maggie has a small chance of spawning with a slightly pre-enchanted Wyrmbane. This artefact is an excellent weapon, if you can manage to take it from her.

History

  • Maggie was added in version 0.25.

rawPage:
{{version|028}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Maggie the Vainglorious''' is a [[unique]] [[fire elementalist]] apprentice. She wears [[steam dragon scales|steam]], [[acid dragon scales|acid]], or [[swamp dragon scales]]. 

She is a younger, weaker version of [[Margery]]. Maggie and Margery are mutually exclusive; if one appears in a game, the other will not.

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:6-10
*[[The Lair]]:1-2

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Her [[Bolt of Fire]] seriously hurts, but Maggie herself is reasonably squishy. Try to disable her with [[Hexes]] or a [[wand]] if possible -- her [[willpower]] and [[hit dice]] are both mediocre. [[Mephitic Cloud]] or [[dart]]s are also effective as long as she isn't wearing swamp dragon scales, though darts will require some skill in using them to be reliable.
*If you get [[mesmerised]] and need to retreat, you'll need to either disable Maggie using one of the aforementioned methods or break [[LOS|line-of-sight]]. Reading a [[scroll of teleportation]] or [[scroll of fog]] will work adequately.
*Maggie has a small chance of spawning with a slightly pre-enchanted [[Wyrmbane]]. This artefact is an excellent weapon, if you can manage to take it from her.

==History==
*Maggie was added in version [[0.25]].
